sense.def:
Dejanja, ki so
revolutionary
, imajo za svoj cilj politično revolucijo.

seg.quote: They had fled as a result of their revolutionary activities.

sense.def:
A revolutionary
je oseba, ki poskuša povzročiti revolucijo ali sodeluje v njej.

Zamisli in dogajanja, ki so
revolutionary
, prinesejo velike spremembe v ustaljene postopke.

seg.quote: ...a revolutionary change in the way cars are manufactured.
